overview: A day in the life of a couple of boys. They love each other, but they are incurable hunters. Maurice's nephew comes to visit. Near the station, Maurice is drawn by the park and its chicken - an escapade for Maurice as he forgets all about fidelity! But he is so cute, the little nephew from the country. Disaster is brewing. At night, the sounds of noisy screwing from the two lovers attracts the shy nephew. Timidly he joins them and is drawn into their games. Passion finally gives rise to jealousy. When Maurice goes shopping in town he has trouble in the changing rooms.... He stays away too long and at home there's time for his friend and nephew to renew their acquaintance... A glimpse of the supreme beauty of youth as boys take lessons in mastering the art of pleasure.
title: Maurice and his Friends
